017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.Constable;
021import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
024
025import java.util.Collection;
026import java.util.HashSet;
027import java.util.Iterator;
028import java.util.Objects;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import java.util.Set;
031import java.util.SortedSet;
032import java.util.Spliterator;
033import java.util.TreeSet;
034
035import java.util.function.Predicate;
036
037import java.util.stream.Stream;
038
039import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
040
041import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
042import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
043
044import static java.util.Collections.emptySortedSet;
045import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSortedSet;
046
047import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Iterable;
048
049/**
050 * An abstract, immutable {@linkplain Iterable iterable} collection of
051 * {@link Binding} instances.
052 *
053 * @param <K> the type of a {@link Binding}'s {@linkplain
054 * Binding#attributes() attribute keys}
055 *
056 * @param <V> the type of a {@link Binding}'s {@linkplain
057 * Binding#attributes() attribute values}
058 *
059 * @param <B> The concrete subtype of this class
060 *
061 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
062 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
063 */
064public abstract class Bindings<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, B extends Binding<K, V, B>> implements Constable, Iterable<B> {
065
066
067  /*
068   * Instance fields.
069   */
070
071
072  private final SortedSet<B> bindings;
073
074
075  /*
076   * Constructors.
077   */
078
079
080  /**
081   * Creates a new {@link Bindings}.
082   *
083   * <p>Duplicate {@link Binding} instances contained by the supplied
084   * {@link Iterable} will be discarded.</p>
085   *
086   * @param bindings the {@link Binding} instances that will be
087   * contained by this {@link Bindings}
088   */
089  protected Bindings(final Iterable<? extends B> bindings) {
090    super();
091    if (bindings == null) {
092      this.bindings = emptySortedSet();
093    } else {
094      final Iterator<? extends B> i = bindings.iterator();
095      if (i.hasNext()) {
096        final SortedSet<B> newBindings = new TreeSet<>();
097        newBindings.add(i.next());
098        while (i.hasNext()) {
099          newBindings.add(i.next());
100        }
101        this.bindings = unmodifiableSortedSet(newBindings);
102      } else {
103        this.bindings = emptySortedSet();
104      }
105    }
106  }
107
108
109  /*
110   * Instance methods.
111   */
112
113
114  /**
115   * Returns {@code true} if this {@link Bindings} is logically empty.
116   *
117   * @return {@code true} if this {@link Bindings} is logically empty
118   *
119   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
120   *
121   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
122   * threads.
123   *
124   * @see #size()
125   */
126  public final boolean isEmpty() {
127    return this.bindings.isEmpty();
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Returns {@code 0} or a positive integer describing the number of
132   * entries contained by this {@link Bindings}.
133   *
134   * @return the size of this {@link Bindings}
135   *
136   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
137   *
138   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
139   * threads.
140   */
141  public final int size() {
142    return this.bindings.size();
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Returns the sole {@link Binding} {@linkplain Binding#value()
147   * value} whose {@linkplain Binding#name() name} {@linkplain
148   * String#equals(Object) is equal to} the supplied {@code name}, or
149   * {@code null} if either there is no such {@link Binding} or there
150   * are several {@link Binding}s with the supplied {@code name}.
151   *
152   * @param name the name; may be {@code null} in which case {@code
153   * false} will be returned
154   *
155   * @return the sole {@link Binding} {@linkplain Binding#value()
156   * value} whose {@linkplain Binding#name() name} {@linkplain
157   * String#equals(Object) is equal to} the supplied {@code name}, or
158   * {@code null} if either there is no such {@link Binding} or there
159   * are several {@link Binding}s with the supplied {@code name}.
160   *
161   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
162   *
163   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
164   *
165   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
166   * threads.
167   *
168   * @see #unique(String)
169   */
170  public final V uniqueValue(final String name) {
171    final B b = this.unique(name);
172    return b == null ? null : b.value();
173  }
174
175  /**
176   * Returns the sole {@link Binding} instance whose {@linkplain
177   * Binding#name() name} {@linkplain String#equals(Object) is equal
178   * to} the supplied {@code name}, or {@code null} if either there is
179   * no such {@link Binding} or there are several {@link Binding}s
180   * with the supplied {@code name}.
181   *
182   * @param name the name; may be {@code null} in which case {@code
183   * false} will be returned
184   *
185   * @return the sole {@link Binding} instance whose {@linkplain
186   * Binding#name() name} {@linkplain String#equals(Object) is equal
187   * to} the supplied {@code name}, or {@code null} if either there is
188   * no such {@link Binding} or there are several {@link Binding}s
189   * with the supplied {@code name}.
190   *
191   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
192   *
193   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
194   *
195   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
196   * threads.
197   */
198  public final B unique(final String name) {
199    B returnValue = null;
200    if (name != null) {
201      for (final B b : this) {
202        if (b.name().equals(name)) {
203          if (returnValue == null) {
204            returnValue = b;
205          } else {
206            return null;
207          }
208        }
209      }
210    }
211    return returnValue;
212  }
213
214  /**
215   * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Object}
216   * is contained by this {@link Bindings}.
217   *
218   * <p>If the {@link Object} is a {@link Binding}, the containment
219   * check is performed via an equality check.  If the {@link Object}
220   * is a {@link String}, then this method will return {@code true} if
221   * there is a {@link Binding} contained by this {@link Bindings}
222   * whose {@linkplain Binding#name() name} {@linkplain
223   * String#equals(Object) is equal to} the supplied {@link
224   * String}.</p>
225   *
226   * <p>There may be many {@link Binding} instances contained by this
227   * {@link Bindings} whose {@linkplain Binding#name() names} are
228   * {@linkplain String#equals(Object) equal}.</p>
229   *
230   * @param o the {@link Object} to test; {@code true} return values
231   * are possible only when this {@link Object} is either a {@link
232   * Binding} or a {@link String}
233   *
234   * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Object}
235   * is contained by this {@link Bindings}
236   *
237   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
238   *
239   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
240   * threads.
241   *
242   * @see #containsUnique(String)
243   */
244  public final boolean contains(final Object o) {
245    if (o == null || o instanceof Binding<?, ?, ?>) {
246      return this.bindings.contains(o);
247    }
248    for (final B b : this) {
249      if (b.name().equals(o)) {
250        return true;
251      }
252    }
253    return false;
254  }
255
256  /**
257   * Returns {@code true} if and only if there is exactly one {@link
258   * Binding} contained by this {@link Bindings} whose {@linkplain
259   * Binding#name() name} {@linkplain String#equals(Object) is equal
260   * to} the supplied {@code name}.
261   *
262   * @param name the name to test; may be {@code null} in which case
263   * {@code false} will be returned
264   *
265   * @return {@code true} if and only if there is exactly one {@link
266   * Binding} contained by this {@link Bindings} whose {@linkplain
267   * Binding#name() name} {@linkplain String#equals(Object) is equal
268   * to} the supplied {@code name}
269   *
270   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
271   *
272   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
273   * threads.
274   */
275  public final boolean containsUnique(final String name) {
276    return this.unique(name) != null;
277  }
278
279  /**
280   * Returns a {@link Stream} of this {@link Bindings}' {@linkplain
281   * Binding entries}.
282   *
283   * @return a {@link Stream} of this {@link Bindings}' {@linkplain
284   * Binding entries}
285   *
286   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
287   *
288   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
289   *
290   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
291   * threads.
292   */
293  public final Stream<B> stream() {
294    return this.bindings.stream();
295  }
296
297  /**
298   * Returns a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Iterator} of {@link
299   * Binding} instances contained by this {@link Bindings}.
300   *
301   * @return a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Iterator} of {@link
302   * Binding} instances contained by this {@link Bindings}
303   *
304   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
305   *
306   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
307   *
308   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
309   * threads.
310   */
311  @Override // Iterable<B>
312  public final Iterator<B> iterator() {
313    return this.bindings.iterator();
314  }
315
316  /**
317   * Returns a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Spliterator} of
318   * {@link Binding} instances contained by this {@link Bindings}.
319   *
320   * @return a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Spliterator} of
321   * {@link Binding} instances contained by this {@link Bindings}
322   *
323   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
324   *
325   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
326   *
327   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
328   * threads.
329   */
330  @Override // Iterable<B>
331  public final Spliterator<B> spliterator() {
332    return this.bindings.spliterator();
333  }
334
335  /**
336   * Returns the number of entries this {@link Bindings} has in common
337   * with the supplied {@link Iterable}.
338   *
339   * <p>The number returned will be {@code 0} or greater.</p>
340   *
341   * @param other the {@link Iterable}; may be {@code null} in which
342   * case {@code 0} will be returned
343   *
344   * @return the number of entries this {@link Bindings} has in common
345   * with the supplied {@link Iterable}
346   *
347   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
348   *
349   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
350   * threads.
351   */
352  public final int intersectionSize(final Iterable<?> other) {
353    if (other == null) {
354      return 0;
355    } else if (this == other) {
356      return this.size();
357    } else {
358      final Iterator<?> i = other.iterator();
359      if (i.hasNext()) {
360        int count = this.bindings.contains(i.next()) ? 1 : 0;
361        while (i.hasNext()) {
362          if (this.bindings.contains(i.next())) {
363            ++count;
364          }
365        }
366        return count;
367      } else {
368        return 0;
369      }
370    }
371  }
372
373  /**
374   * Returns the size of the <em>symmetric difference</em> between
375   * this {@link Bindings} and the supplied {@link Iterable}.
376   *
377   * <p>The number returned is always {@code 0} or greater.</p>
378   *
379   * <p>The size of the symmetric difference between this {@link
380   * Bindings} instance and the supplied {@link Iterable} is the
381   * number of entries that are in one of these two objects but not in
382   * the other.</p>
383   *
384   * @param other an {@link Iterable}; may be {@code null} in which
385   * case the result of an invocation of this {@link Bindings}'
386   * {@link #size()} method will be returned
387   *
388   * @return the size of the <em>symmetric difference</em> between
389   * this {@link Bindings} and the supplied {@link Iterable}; always
390   * {@code 0} or greater
391   *
392   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
393   *
394   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
395   * threads.
396   */
397  public final int symmetricDifferenceSize(final Iterable<?> other) {
398    if (other == null) {
399      return this.size();
400    } else if (this == other) {
401      return 0;
402    } else {
403      final Iterator<?> i = other.iterator();
404      if (i.hasNext()) {
405        final Set<? super Object> symmetricDifference = new HashSet<>(this.bindings);
406        Object b = i.next();
407        if (!symmetricDifference.add(b)) {
408          symmetricDifference.remove(b);
409        }
410        while (i.hasNext()) {
411          b = i.next();
412          if (!symmetricDifference.add(b)) {
413            symmetricDifference.remove(b);
414          }
415        }
416        return symmetricDifference.size();
417      } else {
418        return this.size();
419      }
420    }
421  }
422
423  /**
424   * Returns an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc}
425   * describing this {@link Bindings}, if this {@link Bindings} is
426   * capable of being represented as a <a
427   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
428   * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link
429   * Optional} if not.
430   *
431   * @return an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc}
432   * describing this {@link Binding}, if this {@link Bindings} is
433   * capable of being represented as a <a
434   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
435   * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link
436   * Optional} if not
437   *
438   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
439   *
440   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
441   *
442   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
443   * threads.
444   *
445   * @see #describeConstructor()
446   *
447   * @see <a
448   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">Dynamically-computed
449   * constants</a>
450   */
451  @Override // Constable
452  public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
453    final MethodHandleDesc constructor = this.describeConstructor();
454    if (constructor == null) {
455      return Optional.empty();
456    }
457    final ConstantDesc bindingsCd = Constables.describeConstable(this.bindings).orElse(null);
458    if (bindingsCd == null) {
459      return Optional.empty();
460    }
461    return
462      Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, constructor, bindingsCd));
463  }
464
465  /**
466   * Returns a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
467   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
468   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
469   * constant</a> representing this {@link Bindings}.
470   *
471   * @return a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
472   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
473   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
474   * constant</a> representing this {@link Bindings}
475   *
476   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
477   * return {@code null}.
478   *
479   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
480   * idempotent and deterministic.
481   *
482   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
483   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
484   */
485  protected MethodHandleDesc describeConstructor() {
486    return
487      MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(this.getClass().describeConstable().orElseThrow(),
488                                     new ClassDesc[] { CD_Iterable });
489  }
490
491  /**
492   * Returns a hashcode for this {@link Bindings}.
493   *
494   * @return a hashcode for this {@link Bindings}
495   *
496   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
497   * idempotent and deterministic.
498   *
499   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
500   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
501   *
502   * @see #equals(Object)
503   */
504  @Override // Object
505  public final int hashCode() {
506    return this.bindings.hashCode();
507  }
508
509  /**
510   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Bindings} is
511   * equal to the supplied {@link Object}.
512   *
513   * <p>The supplied {@link Object} is considered to be equal to this
514   * {@link Bindings} if and only if:</p>
515   *
516   * <ul>
517   *
518   * <li>Its {@linkplain #getClass() class} is identical to this
519   * {@link Bindings}' {@linkplain #getClass() class}, and</li>
520   *
521   * <li>Each of the {@link Binding} instances it contains is
522   * {@linkplain Binding#equals(Object) equal to} the corresponding
523   * {@link Binding} instance contained by this {@link Bindings}</li>
524   *
525   * </ul>
526   *
527   * @param other the {@link Object} to test; may be {@code null} in
528   * which case {@code false} will be returned
529   *
530   * @return {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to
531   * this {@link Binding}
532   *
533   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
534   * idempotent and deterministic.
535   *
536   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
537   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
538   *
539   * @see #hashCode()
540   *
541   * @see Binding#equals(Object)
542   */
543  @Override // Object
544  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
545    if (other == this) {
546      return true;
547    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
548      final Bindings<?, ?, ?> her = (Bindings<?, ?, ?>)other;
549      return
550        Objects.equals(this.bindings, her.bindings);
551    } else {
552      return false;
553    }
554  }
555
556  /**
557   * Returns a {@link String} representation of this {@link Bindings}.
558   *
559   * <p>The format of the returned {@link String} is deliberately
560   * undefined and may change between versions of this class without
561   * prior notice.</p>
562   *
563   * @return a {@link String} representation of this {@link Bindings}
564   *
565   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
566   * return {@code null}.
567   *
568   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
569   * idempotent and deterministic.
570   *
571   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
572   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
573   */
574  @Override // Object
575  public String toString() {
576    return this.bindings.toString();
577  }
578
579}
